key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny around ESG disclosures and compliance
Market volatility impacting AUM levels and revenue
Intense competition in ESG and passive investing
Reliance on money market funds exposes to shifts in short-term interest rates
controversies: Withdrawal of sponsorship from a climate-skeptic coalition following client pressure
Potential reputational risks from perceived greenwashing in ESG strategies
environmental_issues: Heightened scrutiny on the authenticity of sustainable investment strategies
social_issues: Reputation risks due to ESG positioning and client expectations
governance_issues: Compliance with evolving financial regulations in multiple jurisdictions
